Name: Food Delivery Service
About the game: The 4th of low-price series of KimidoriSoft! 'Food Delivery Service' Appears! For video creators and streamers KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games. Overview You are a delivery man for a food delivery service. A friend invites you to Nodaira-cho Town, a town that is rumored to be making a lot of money these days, and you work as a delivery person there, but little by little you get caught up in strange incidents. This is an adventure game that makes you think about what is the right thing to do. Features Choices The ending changes depending on the player's choice, but I made it so that the player can start over right away, because I think it would be hard to play the game over and over again and make all the choices. There are exceptions. About the game This is a horror game of the type that is scary when you know what it means. There are no direct horror expressions, but there are some violent expressions and murders, so please be careful. Auto save Progress is automatically saved at key points, allowing you to continue playing from where you left off. # Approximate play time to complete the game is about 1 hour.
